channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Security Directory Suite VA
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Security Directory Suite VA

item.title: CVE-2022-33166|2024-08-03T08:01:19.948Z -- ibm -- security%20directory%20suite%20va
item.description: IBM Security Directory Suite VA 8.0.1 through 8.0.1.19 could allow a privileged user to upload malicious files of dangerous types that can be automatically processed within the product's environment. IBM X-Force ID: 228586.

item.title: CVE-2022-33168|2024-08-03T08:01:20.356Z -- ibm -- security%20directory%20suite%20va
item.description: IBM Security Directory Suite VA 8.0.1 could allow an attacker to cause a denial of service due to uncontrolled resource consumption. IBM X-Force ID: 228588.

item.title: CVE-2022-32752|2024-08-03T07:46:44.967Z -- ibm -- security%20directory%20suite%20va
item.description: IBM Security Directory Suite VA 8.0.1 through 8.0.1.19 could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system by sending a specially crafted request. IBM X-Force ID: 228439.

item.title: CVE-2022-32757|2024-08-03T07:46:45.334Z -- ibm -- security%20directory%20suite%20va
item.description: IBM Security Directory Suite VA 8.0.1 through 8.0.1.19 uses an inadequate account lockout setting that could allow a remote attacker to brute force account credentials. IBM X-Force ID: 228510.

item.title: CVE-2022-33163|2024-08-03T08:01:20.411Z -- ibm -- security%20directory%20suite%20va
item.description: IBM Security Directory Suite VA 8.0.1 specifies permissions for a security-critical resource in a way that allows that resource to be read or modified by unintended actors. IBM X-Force ID: 228571.

item.title: CVE-2022-33159|2024-08-03T08:01:20.240Z -- ibm -- security%20directory%20suite%20va
item.description: IBM Security Directory Suite VA 8.0.1 through 8.0.1.19 stores user credentials in plain clear text which can be read by an authenticated user. IBM X-Force ID: 228567.
